synopsis.text: When Kakeru is summoned by his friend the Professor, he finds himself embroiled in an unexpected adventure. An evil monkey named Spector has escaped from a circus. Using a mind-controlling device, Spector has become more intelligent and gained the ability to control other monkeys. The Professor tasks Kakeru with capturing the monkeys, especially the sinister Spector. Kakeru's mission proves challenging, as the monkeys have acquired mysterious helmets that enhance their abilities. With Spector determined to use his newfound powers to dominate the world, Kakeru races against time to thwart the monkey's nefarious plans. Traveling through dimensions, battling primates, and outwitting the menacing Spector, Kakeru embarks on a thrilling quest to save humanity. This lighthearted anime follows Kakeru's globetrotting exploits to capture the empowered monkeys. With humor and hijinks at every turn, the show is a rollicking adventure about an unexpected hero who must rise to the occasion and defeat a surprising simian foe.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
